long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The PokerNow Assistant Browser Extension enhances your PokerNow experience by providing real-time win rates and common hand statistics as you play. With this tool, you'll have valuable insights at your fingertips, helping you make informed decisions and improve your game.

Features
Winrate Display: Shows your current win rate directly within the game.
Common Hands Statistics: Displays the odds and win rates for your three most common hands.
Initial hand decision: Tells you to Call, Raise, or Fold your first hand
